mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join((f'{x}^{y}' if y > 1 else str(x) for (x, y) in sorted(factor_counts.items())))
return ' * '.join((f'{x}^{y}' if y >= 1 else str(x) for (x, y) in sorted(factor_counts.items())))
return ' * '.join((f'{x}^{y}' if y <= 1 else str(x) for (x, y) in sorted(factor_counts.items())))
return ' * '.join((f'{x}^{y}' if y != 1 else str(x) for (x, y) in sorted(factor_counts.items())))
return ' * '.join((f'{x}^{y}' if y > 2 else str(x) for (x, y) in sorted(factor_counts.items())))
return ' * '.join((f'{x}^{y}' if y > 0 else str(x) for (x, y) in sorted(factor_counts.items())))
return ' * '.join((f'{x}^{y}' if y > 0 else str(x) for (x, y) in sorted(factor_counts.items())))
return ' * '.join((f'{x}^{y}' if y > -1 else str(x) for (x, y) in sorted(factor_counts.items())))
return ' * '.join((f'{x}{y}' if y > 1 else str(x) for (x, y) in sorted(factor_counts.items())))
